preqs: Students must have passed AFF2401, BFF2401, BFW2401 or AFW2401 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {AFF2401, AFW2401, BFF2401, BFW2401} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {AFF3331%, AFW3331, AFX3331%, BFW3331, DEB333, DEB3331%, FIN333, FIN3331}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {AFW3331, AFX3871, BFF3331}

description: The international monetary system, debt and country risk, the foreign exchange market, international financing strategies and techniques, the Euro-markets, and multinational banking.
